Posts.Content: Aug 11, 2011 06:49AM luvmy2kids wrote: Wow, Aug242007, You must have been reading my mind. This is the decision I have to make.  I am going through chemotherapy currently. I have already had a lumpectomy, but need to decide on rads or BMX. My oncologist says lumpectomy with rads has pretty much the same results (of course there is the 1-2% difference) but he seems to think I am being too radical with the mastectomy. He tells me if it comes back it will most likely be elsewhere...  Thank you for posting!
Posts.Title: Dense Breasts and Lumpectomy Aug242007 Fearless_One

Posts.Content: Jul 5, 2011 04:24AM luvmy2kids wrote: Hello, I noticed your post and had a question about the Avastin clinical study. I have been offered this and am trying to decide whehter or not to do it.. There has been so much in the news lately about Avastin that I am quite scared to partake in the study..  If I do not do it I will do dose dense AC x 4 then 12 weeks of T...  Otherwise I would be placed into one of three other groups with the Avastin (only one of the groups actually has you taking the Avastin).. Any help would be appreciated. Thank you very much!  Rebecca

Posts.Content: Oct 4, 2011 09:34PM luvmy2kids wrote: jbagley- After Taxol number 4 last week I had an awful salty taste in my mouth constantly.  I tried water and it tasted like salt water fron the ocean.. If I eat anything it is like a salt stick is in my mouth...... Today I had infusion number 5 and wating to see if this SE persists.  Lost 5 pounds since last week due to this so maybe it is not such a bad thing;-)))))) Take care!
